title: #263 - Doug Stanhope & ME
description:
I sit down with Doug Stanhope at Johnny Depp's house and talk about Doug's new book, Johnny Depp, The comedy world, and that time I pranked Dane Cook and Daniel Tosh. 

You can order Doug Stanhope's book "This is not fame: A from what I rememoir" that is out now at amazon, Itunes, and Audible. 

https://www.amazon.com/This-Not-Fame-What-Re-Memoir/dp/0306825740/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1512522767&sr=8-1&keywords=doug+stanhope

 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. To get $30 off your first order go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
